homepage.title: Welcome to Plant Swap
homepage.intro: Discover Plant Swap - the web application that makes your neighborhood more social and increases your plant knowledge! Exchange, donate and view cuttings on our platform. Come to the library and become part of our growing community. Let your green gems flourish and make new friends with the same passion. Join Plant Swap and discover a world full of green magic!

stepdescription.step-1: Take a picture or upload one below. We will help you to find the name and needs of your plant.
stepdescription.step-2: Select the plant that matches your plant.
stepdescription.step-3: Fill in the details of your plant.
stepdescription.step-4: Select a plant to swap with.

plant_form.tip_description: In the form, we have already filled in some details about the identified plant for you.
